message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to part with it for $950000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me, and I'm hoping you'll see it as a great deal.

I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $850000. I'm willing to pay that much, but I think it's still a bit high considering the value I can get from it. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was really hoping to get closer to my original price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $900000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value I've placed on the product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $900000. I'm willing to make another counteroffer of $875000. I think this is a fair price considering the value I can get from the product, and I'm willing to compromise to get a deal done.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not willing to go below $920000. I'm willing to give you a small discount, so I'm offering it to you for $915000. This is my final offer, and I hope you'll consider it.

I appreciate your willingness to give me a discount, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable paying $915000. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer of $890000. I think this is a fair price considering the value I can get from the product, and I'm willing to compromise to get a deal done. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I may need to consider buying from John for $1000000.
